en: "Are you sure you want to quit?"
"Your energy is draining! Blast phrases to recover!"

column3: everyone! Welcome to the world of Synesthesia Road!"

en: "The goal of the game is to build up a song track by track. It's not as easy as it sounds!"
"Let's go over the basics so you can get started."
"These are your targets. The small capsules streaming towards you are notes."
"As the notes pass over the targets
"Phrases are groups of notes you need to hit in sequence without missing."
"The highlighted section shows your current phrase."
"Clearing all notes in a phrase activates the track."
"Move to another track after activating it."
"Each activated track increases your streak count and your score multiplier."
"Missing a phrase sets you back to zero. Keep moving from track to track!"
"Tracks will reset in the order you activated them."

column3: though! Successfully hitting phrases refills your energy."

en: "Passing through checkpoints gives you an energy bonus."
"So the goal is to jump between tracks
"If you make it to the end of the song with energy left
"Barriers will sap your energy if you don't have a high enough streak."

column3: maintaining a streak through a barrier gives you your energy bonus!"
your energy will not refill when hitting phrases."

en: "Checkpoints also do not give energy bonuses. Mistakes are more costly here!"
"Keep your wits about you -- this is intended for the most hardcore of DJs!"
